ISSUE.TITLE: Formulas Not Calculating after latest release
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I haven't used my NocoDb install for a few months. After the latest update none of the formulas are performing calculations. I have checked the formula and it is correct. It is a simple subtraction formula (Size-Used) that I am using in the Remaining column to calculate the remaining amount. It accepts the formula, but won't output anything to the cell with the formula. Without formulas, I will have to move back to Airtable. I really prefer to self-host to protect our data. Thanks!
